alessandro_aglietti.bio: Alessandro Aglietti, from Firenze, is aqquadro: since 2004 face-to-face to a monitor. Not to write poems! Be RSS: ban social network from life for life.
alessandro_aglietti.name: Alessandro Aglietti
alessandro_aglietti.title: Frontend Developer

andrea_maglie.shortBio: Senior Developer specialized in Java and, more recently, in Kotlin
andrea_maglie.name: Andrea Maglie
andrea_maglie.title: Senior Developer
andrea_maglie.bio: Andrea Maglie is a Senior Developer specialized in Java and, more recently, in Kotlin. He currently works on Musement's Android app and Google Assistant app.

anela_todorovic.bio: She is a huge blockchain enthusiast and the main programmer on the blockchain based voting system in the Balkans. In May 2018, she has held a speech on the Point conference regarding this buzzing topic, that opened her various doors in her career.
anela_todorovic.shortBio: Tech ninja | DAPP researcher - huge blockchain enthusiast and the main programmer on the blockchain based voting system in the Balkans.
anela_todorovic.name: Anđela Todorović
anela_todorovic.title: DAPP researcher | Software developer

aygul_zagidullina.shortBio: WTM and GDG Lead, is a passionate Actions on Google developer.
aygul_zagidullina.name: Aygul Zagidullina
aygul_zagidullina.title: Actions on Google Developer, GDG/WTM London Lead
aygul_zagidullina.bio: Dr. Aygul Zagidullina is a passionate Actions on Google developer. Her work experience includes Google, Todoist, MotaWord. She holds a PhD in quantum chemistry and prior to Google dedicated 6 years to scientific research at the University of Stuttgart. Aygul is a very active member of the London digital ecosystem and has been involved in many innovative projects. She is a Google Developer Group (GDG)/ Women Techmakers (WTM) London lead, Google Top Contributor (TC)/ Trusted Tester (TT), and UK STEM Ambassador. Aygul has been a distinguished speaker at numerous international industry events in the US (at Google HQ), UK, Germany, Ireland, UAE, Greece, Turkey, Poland, Georgia, and Russia. She was named as one of The NEXT 100 Top Influencers of the European Digital Industry in 2013.

boris_damato.bio: Boris is an Android Developer working at ClearScore. He likes participating at tech conferences, giving talks, sharing knowledge and learning new things, but above all, he loves making beautiful and performant apps. He loves learning new languages, architectural patterns and building meaningful animations.
boris_damato.name: Boris D'Amato
boris_damato.title: Android Developer @ ClearScore - GDG Bari co-organizer

busra_deniz_akn.name: Buşra Deniz Akın
busra_deniz_akn.title: Android Dev @TAB, Lead @GDGLondon & @WTMLondon
busra_deniz_akn.bio:
Buşra Deniz Akin is a Software Engineer who has a keen interest in developing high-quality mobile applications. Currently, she’s working for The App Business. 

Besides being co-organizer in two different communities, Google Developer Group and WomenTechMakers London, she enjoys voluntarily organising and speaking at developer events.  She believes in sharing knowledge and collaborating with the other people through these events, will come hand in hand with innovation and new perspectives.
busra_deniz_akn.shortBio: Currently, she’s working for The App Business.  Besides being co-organizer in two different communities, Google Developer Group and WomenTechMakers London

elia_rigo.title: CEO @ Cocodrylo Software
elia_rigo.bio: I was born in 1994. I’ve always been interested in IT since I was a child. I’m currently a student at the University of Trento attending a Master in Computer Sciences. Simultaneously, in 2011, I set up my own startup and from 2017 I collaborate with the Bruno Kessler Foundation in the Embedded System division.
elia_rigo.shortBio: Always been interested in IT since I was a child. I’m currently a student at the University of Trento attending a Master in Computer Sciences
elia_rigo.name: Elia Rigo

fabio_collini.bio:
Fabio Collini is a Google Developer Expert for Android, he started Android development in 2009, first as a freelance with two apps on Play Store and then as senior developer. Now he works as a remote developer in the Android team at the New York Times. He is one of the authors of the second edition of Android Programmazione Avanzata, an Italian book dedicated to some advanced aspects of Android development.
He is a co-owner and writer for the blog CodingJam dedicated to Java, Android and web development.
fabio_collini.shortBio: Google Developer Expert for Android, he started Android development in 2009
fabio_collini.name: Fabio Collini
fabio_collini.title: Android Engineer

francesca_stagnaro.name: Francesca Stagnaro
francesca_stagnaro.title: Electronic Engineer
francesca_stagnaro.bio: I'm an electronic engineer. In my life I worked as consultant, developing web portals, but also as firmware developer and I have a lot of fun when I can develop IoT systems. I've been working in Revevol since 2016 and now I'm leading the development of a product which is deployed on GCP and which uses several GCP services.
francesca_stagnaro.shortBio: I'm an electronic engineer. In my life I worked as consultant, developing web portals, but also as firmware developer and I have a lot of fun when I can develop IoT systems.

giuseppe_filograno.bio:
After a small game dev experience, I begin to develop iOS mobile application in 2014.
Now I'm working on native Android and iOS app, discovering a lot of similarities!
giuseppe_filograno.shortBio: Native Mobile Developer @Enjore and passionate about mobile technologies
giuseppe_filograno.name: Giuseppe Filograno
giuseppe_filograno.title: Enjore Srl, Native Mobile Developer

kaan_mamikoglu.title: Mobile Software Engineer
kaan_mamikoglu.bio: Kaan is a mobile software engineer at MyDrive Solutions, a Generali company, in London, UK. As an active community builder, he has co-organized a lot of developer events in the UK and Turkey such as DevFests, Android Developer Days’, Android Study Jams, and has been a distinguished speaker at many international industry events in the US, UK, UAE, Turkey and Georgia. Besides being a Google Developer Group (GDG) London co-organizer, he is a Google Top Contributor (TC) and a Google Local Guide. Kaan is passionate about exploring new technologies and traveling around the world.
kaan_mamikoglu.shortBio: Mobile software engineer at MyDrive Solutions, a Generali company, in London, UK.
kaan_mamikoglu.name: Kaan Mamikoglu

laura_morinigo.bio: Laura is a Google Developer Expert in Firebase, entrepreneur, and mentor. She has been involved in the tech industry for over 10 years, working with different technologies as a fullstack developer and getting involved with education projects teaching coding. She is one of the organizers of GDG Cloud London and Women Techmakers lead. Originally from Buenos Aires, Argentina, she has been a digital nomad for about one year, traveling around; doing talks, workshops and connecting with the local tech communities. While she was on the road she created with her co-founders DMode Labs: a software company that promotes diversity and remote working.
laura_morinigo.shortBio: Google Developer Expert in Firebase, entrepreneur, and mentor. She has been involved in the tech industry for over 10 years.
laura_morinigo.name: Laura Morinigo
laura_morinigo.title: Software Developer , Mentor & Entrepreneur

leonardo_pirro.title: Android Developer
leonardo_pirro.bio: Nato nel 1993 a San Giovanni Rotondo, Puglia. Sin dalla giovane età mi sono avvicinato al mondo della tecnologia e dello sviluppo software. Android User since 2010, attualmente lavoro come Android Developer in IQUII, a Roma. Seguo tutto ciò che riguarda il mondo Google, in particolare Android e Assistant. Mi piace tutto ciò che riguarda il design e la UX. Ho una smodata passione per le architetture software e la pulizia del codice e nel tempo libero amo la fotografie, leggere, guardare Film/Serie TV o bere una birra in compagnia.
leonardo_pirro.shortBio: Android user since 2010, UX/UI addicted e Android Developer presso IQUII
leonardo_pirro.name: Leonardo Pirro

lorenzo_quiroli.title: Senior Android Developer @ busuu
lorenzo_quiroli.bio: Born and raised in a small town near Milan, now living in London where he's happily coding Android apps. He's even happier when he can write them in Kotlin, his favourite programming language. Feel free to ping him if you want to talk about code or football
lorenzo_quiroli.shortBio: Born and raised in a small town near Milan, now living in London where he's happily coding Android apps
lorenzo_quiroli.name: Lorenzo Quiroli

marco_gomiero.name: Marco Gomiero
marco_gomiero.title: Android Developer
marco_gomiero.bio: I am a Computer Engineer, currently working as Android Developer at Uniwhere. In the (very few) free time I organize events for the Google Developer Group Venezia, I write and talk about tech stuff on ZeroMag.eu and I write code
marco_gomiero.shortBio: Computer Engineer, Android Developer and GDG Venezia organizer.

matteo_venturi.bio: Marketing manager e digital product integrator. La mia esperienza si basa su progetti di piattaforme HR digitali, e-Commerce ed advertising. Ho maturato la mia esperienza in aziende come Italiaonline, Matrix e Buongiorno. Negli ultimi anni ho lanciato e sviluppato startup in ambito #hr e #hrtech dal carattere innovativo e con impatto sociale come Jobmetoo, Jointly e Myco.
matteo_venturi.shortBio: Marketing manager, attualmente lavora presso Myco
matteo_venturi.name: Matteo Venturi
matteo_venturi.title: Marketing manager e digital product integrator

mattia_piccirillo.bio:
Sono uno studente di informatica di quarta superiore, vivo a Firenze ed ho 17 anni.
Frequento il GDG Milano da ormai 3 anni circa.
Sono un tipo decisamente "fissato" sul mondo Google, un vero fan ;).
Il mio lavoro da sogno sarebbe quello di divnetare un Googler.
mattia_piccirillo.shortBio: Studente di informatica e vero appassionato Google
mattia_piccirillo.name: Mattia Piccirillo
mattia_piccirillo.title: Studente di informatica

michel_murabito.bio: Web Developer By Day, Superhero Wannabe By Night!

michelantonio_trizio.shortBio: Engineer,Android developer & Entreprener,I took master degree in computer Engineering with thesis in Artificial Intelligence.
michelantonio_trizio.name: Michelantonio Trizio
michelantonio_trizio.title: CTO
michelantonio_trizio.bio: Engineer & Entreprener. I took master degree in computer Engineering with thesis in Artificial Intelligence at Polytechnic University of Bari in 2007. I worked for several years in ICT companies in the south of Italy as developer. I attended the Mind The Bridge startup school in San Francisco in 2011. Back in Italy I started working on my own companies. I'm the founder of GDG Bari and he is the current community lead. Now, I'm the CTO of Wideverse, a spin-off of Polytechnic University of Bari that works on VR and AR technologies. I'm an Android developer.

panayotis_tzinis.bio:
Panayotis (AKA Darth), is the Intelligence Tech Lead of the X Factory of Moonshot Lab. 
The X Factory is a tech tank based  on the planet of Mustafar, where crazy people, from scientists to artists, to developers to technologists, share their ideas in order to create moonshots! A moonshot is a radical solution, integrating breakthrough technology with native thinking. More than on projects we are exploring ambitions!
Panayotis is also a Google Dev Expert on Product Strategy and a certified Google Sprint Master
panayotis_tzinis.shortBio: Intelligence Tech Lead of the X Factory of Moonshot Lab. The X Factory is a tech tank based on the planet of Mustafar.
panayotis_tzinis.name: Panayotis Tzinis
panayotis_tzinis.title: Google Sprint Master

roberto_orgiu.shortBio: passionate for everything that switches on and off and particularly for handheld and wearable devices.
roberto_orgiu.name: Roberto Orgiu
roberto_orgiu.title: Android Engineer
roberto_orgiu.bio:
Born in Italy in 1987, passionate for everything that switches on and off and particularly for handheld and wearable devices.
I love to learn new languages such as Kotlin, patterns and everything Android-related. I recently joined The New York Times Android team as Android Engineer.

simone_scardapane.bio: I am a post-doc with a focus in machine learning and deep learning. I am very keen on promoting machine learning concepts and making them accessible to everyone by organizing events, speeches, and hackathons. I am the co-organizer of the Rome Machine Learning & Data Science Meetup, that organizes monthly events in Rome, and a member of the advisory board for Codemotion Italy. I am also a co-founder of the Italian Association for Machine Learning, a not-for-profit organization with the aim of promoting machine learning concepts in the public.
simone_scardapane.shortBio: Post-doc @ Sapienza | GDE for ML | IAML co-founder
simone_scardapane.name: Simone Scardapane
simone_scardapane.title: Post-doc @ Sapienza | GDE for ML | IAML co-founder

valentina_carrirolo.title: Community lover <3
